price: And We restored his family to him and the like of them[18] as a mercy from Us and as a reminder for people of understanding.
arabic: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥٓ أَهۡلَهُۥ وَمِثۡلَهُم مَّعَهُمۡ رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنَّا وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ
footnotes: [18] When Allah granted him health, the whole family returned to him and he was granted even more children.
